tasks.label: append_css
tasks.command: echo ".badge { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 500; margin-left: 8px; text-transform: uppercase; } .badge-hymofs { background-color: var(--md-sys-color-tertiary-container); color: var(--md-sys-color-on-tertiary-container); } .badge-overlay { background-color: var(--md-sys-color-secondary-container); color: var(--md-sys-color-on-secondary-container); } .badge-magic { background-color: var(--md-sys-color-primary-container); color: var(--md-sys-color-on-primary-container); }" >> /home/an/hymo/webui/src/routes/ModulesTab.css
